snippet: Liverpool can beat the "best team in the Premier League" when they take on Manchester City in the League Cup final at Wembley on Sunday, according to boss Juergen Klopp....

headline.main: Manchester City Are Beatable in League Cup, Says Klopp
headline.print_headline: Manchester City Are Beatable in League Cup, Says Klopp

lead_paragraph: Liverpool can beat the "best team in the Premier League" when they take on Manchester City in the League Cup final at Wembley on Sunday, according to boss Juergen Klopp.

snippet: Manuel Pellegrini has said he would choose winning the Premier League with Manchester City and being shown the door over continuing as the team's manager for an extended period without any major success....

headline.main: League Title, Not New Contract, Is Priority-Pellegrini
headline.print_headline: League Title, Not New Contract, Is Priority-Pellegrini

lead_paragraph: Manuel Pellegrini has said he would choose winning the Premier League with Manchester City and being shown the door over continuing as the team's manager for an extended period without any major success.

snippet: Some statistical feats have gone the way of flannel uniforms. A look at a game in transition....
abstract: Major League Baseball continues to evolve, and as result some records, like Jose Reyes's 2007 milestone of 75 stolen bases, may never be met again; selection of extraordinary baseball achievements likely never to be seen again highlighted.
lead_paragraph: Some statistical feats have gone the way of flannel uniforms. A look at a game in transition.

snippet: Dusan Tadic scored twice as Southampton handed relegated Aston Villa their 10th successive Premier League defeat with a 4-2 win on Saturday that kept alive their European hopes....

headline.main: Southampton Hand Relegated Villa 10th League Defeat in Row
headline.print_headline: Southampton Hand Relegated Villa 10th League Defeat in Row

lead_paragraph: Dusan Tadic scored twice as Southampton handed relegated Aston Villa their 10th successive Premier League defeat with a 4-2 win on Saturday that kept alive their European hopes.

snippet: Russia's Champions League contenders suffered setbacks in their preparation for next week's group matches when they were knocked out of their domestic Cup by lower-league teams on Wednesday....

headline.main: Russian Champions League Sides Dumped Out of Cup
headline.print_headline: Russian Champions League Sides Dumped Out of Cup

lead_paragraph: Russia's Champions League contenders suffered setbacks in their preparation for next week's group matches when they were knocked out of their domestic Cup by lower-league teams on Wednesday.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur say next week's clash with Monaco will be played in front of the highest attendance for a Champions League game in England, with more than 80,000 tickets sold....

headline.main: Tottenham Set to Break British Attendance Record for Champions League
headline.print_headline: Tottenham Set to Break British Attendance Record for Champions League

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur say next week's clash with Monaco will be played in front of the highest attendance for a Champions League game in England, with more than 80,000 tickets sold.

snippet: Manchester United and Liverpool, English football's two most decorated clubs, will face each other in the last 16 of the Europa League, extending a rivalry dating back to the 19th century into European competition for the first time....

headline.main: Soccer-Man United Face Liverpool in Europa League Last 16
headline.print_headline: Soccer-Man United Face Liverpool in Europa League Last 16

lead_paragraph: Manchester United and Liverpool, English football's two most decorated clubs, will face each other in the last 16 of the Europa League, extending a rivalry dating back to the 19th century into European competition for the first time.

snippet: Manager Slaven Bilic has played down West Ham United's chances of qualifying for the Champions League after Wednesday's 1-0 Premier League win over London rivals Tottenham Hotspur....

headline.main: Bilic Plays Down Champions League Hopes After Spurs Win
headline.print_headline: Bilic Plays Down Champions League Hopes After Spurs Win

lead_paragraph: Manager Slaven Bilic has played down West Ham United's chances of qualifying for the Champions League after Wednesday's 1-0 Premier League win over London rivals Tottenham Hotspur.

snippet: Marseille’s lackluster season took another turn for the worse as the nine-time French champion bowed out of the League Cup quarterfinals while its bitter rival Paris St.-Germain advanced with a 2-1 win over Lyon....
abstract: Paris St-Germain defeats Lyon, 2-1, to advance to League Cup quarterfinals; other soccer matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Marseille’s lackluster season took another turn for the worse as the nine-time French champion bowed out of the League Cup quarterfinals while its bitter rival Paris St.-Germain advanced with a 2-1 win over Lyon.

snippet: Liverpool will be looking to end a dismal Premier League run against Manchester United and build on a promising start to the campaign with victory over their bitter north west rivals on Monday....

headline.main: Liverpool Bid to End Woeful League Run Against United
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Bid to End Woeful League Run Against United

lead_paragraph: Liverpool will be looking to end a dismal Premier League run against Manchester United and build on a promising start to the campaign with victory over their bitter north west rivals on Monday.
